Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ الْجَهْلِ جَهْلُ الْإِنْسَانِ أَمْرَ نَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: The greatest ignorance is the ignorance of a person about himself

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَنْشُدُ ضَالَّتَهُ وَقَدْ أَضَلَّ نَفْسَهُ فَلَا يَطْلُبُهَا
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who searches for the thing he has lost while he has lost his own soul and does not seek it!

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَجْهَلُ نَفْسَهُ كَيْفَ يَعْرِفُ رَبَّهُ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who is ignorant about himself, how can he know his Lord?!

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَعْرِفُ غَيْرَهُ مَنْ يجعل [يَجْهَلُ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: How can one know others when he is ignorant of himself?!

Wisdom: كَفَى بِالْمَرْءِ جَهْلًا أَنْ يَجْهَلَ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: It suffices as ignorance for a person to be ignorant about himself
One who is ignorant of his soul neglects it

Wisdom: مَنْ جَهِلَ نَفْسَهُ كَانَ بِغَيْرِ نَفْسِهِ أَجْهَلُ
enWisdom: One who is ignorant about himself is more ignorant about others

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَعْرِفْ نَفْسَهُ بَعُدَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ النَّجَاةِ وَخَبَطَ فِي الضَّلَالِ وَالْجَهَالاتِ
enWisdom: One who does not know himself is distanced from the path of salvation and stumbles in misguidance and ignorance

Wisdom: لَا تَجْهَلْ نَفْسَكَ فَإِنَّ الْجَاهِلَ مَعْرِفَةَ نَفْسِهِ جَاهِلٌ بِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ
enWisdom: Do not be ignorant of yourself for indeed the one who is ignorant about himself is ignorant about everything
